name: Friday Frenzy
description:
It’s Black Friday! 

An army of furious clients showed up at the mall, with the ultimate goal of stealing all the items in sell. Shop defenders with various abilities, such as clerks or vigils will appear to stop them. Distract the shop defenders, steal all the items and destroy all the aisles in order to win!

Genre : Reversed tower defense, Point & click, 2D top down
Platform : PC
Engine : Unity 
Language : English

Destroy the aisles

Buy new characters

Context

We are 2nd year students at IIM. This game has been made during the Rookie Game Jam, which has been organized by our school. The theme was "Black Friday", and in addition we had to follow some constraints :

  • Destroy
  • Random
  • Management
  • But no movement
The team 

Benjamin Chariou - Game Programmer

Pierre Arvis - Game Programmer
